document_data.name: Bless Weapon
document_data.mainbody: '''Bless weapon''' was a [[transmutation]] spell that grants a weapon a temporary holy aura.
document_data.Effects: A [[paladin]] used this spell to enhance a weapon to be more deadly against evil creatures. When the spell was in effect, the blessed weapon was able to cause terrible damage to all evil creatures, including incorporeal creatures. A paladin was able to cast this spell on the ammunition of a ranged weapon, such as [[arrow]]s. If the spell was cast on a ranged weapon but not the ammunition, the ammunition would not be blessed.
document_data.Components: This spell required only  [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components.
